“The aim is to try to create a unique show – something special and out of the ordinary” -- Nick Cave

Nick Cave has announced some rare solo dates across Europe for Spring 2015. Having already announced a solo run in Australia for October & November this year, these special and intimate dates will see Cave performing in some of the more majestic theatres and auditoriums across Europe including shows in Moscow & St. Petersburg.

Cave will be joined in these solo performances by Warren Ellis (guitar/violin/Mandolin/loops), Martyn Casey (bass), Thomas Wydler (drums) and Barry Adamson (keys/vibes) to present songs from across his considerable catalogue, including selections from 2013′s Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds album Push The Sky Away.

Tickets go on sale at 10.00am (CET) Friday 3rd October 2014 (except Germany: Monday 6th October). Visit www.nickcave.com/live for tickets.
